last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 7
last_episode_to_air.overview: Those closest to Irina discuss the artist’s impact on both her loved ones and the music industry. Later, Irina finds the peace she was seeking at the beginning of her journey.

name: On My Way with Irina Rimes
overview: After two years of working nonstop, singer Irina Rimes makes a two-week journey in a mobile studio, traveling across Romania and beyond in order to reconnect with herself, find inspiration, and complete her new album, Home.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Singer Irina Rimes and her team embark on a two-week trip across Romania to complete her new album, Home.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: While a camera shy Irina continues to deal with the pressures of the industry, the team pauses to visit a bear sanctuary. Later, Irina and her producer Alex Cotoi travel to the mountains to work on a new hit.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: After performing a live, raw version of Home, Irina and her band get feedback from emotional fans. Then, Irina’s boyfriend, David, joins the crew for a music session in the sun.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: A new day, a new music session. We go behind the scenes of the Irina Rimes project and find out how her look was completely made over. Band members, along with Irina's manager, talk about the freedom of expression that the project has given them.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: After traveling to Piatra Neamț, Irina connects with children living in a group home, sharing her own journey and encouraging them to follow their dreams. Then, after an impromptu concert in Iași, Irina performs with an orchestra at The Artist Awards.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Irina opens up about her past and present relationships before stopping in Sorova, Moldova to visit her childhood voice teacher. After finally reaching her parents’ home in Izvoare, Irina performs for loved ones.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Those closest to Irina discuss the artist’s impact on both her loved ones and the music industry. Later, Irina finds the peace she was seeking at the beginning of her journey.
